Texts.Eng: -20% Fire, Electric, Ice, and Poison Resistance
If Shapeshift is equipped, shrink and gain +50% Physical Resistance when Health drops below 15%. Item usage is disabled while shrunken.

Press [F], [Shift], or [S] to shapeshift into one of three monsters: [F] for Wisper; [F] + [Shift] for Poptop; [F] + [S] for Orbide. Each transformation has a Passive and 4 Actions via Left Click, Right Click, [G], and [H]. While transformed, check the Unique Weapon box above for more info. After getting many kills, you may notice a bright flash: if so, press [Shift], [S], and [F] to ???.
